      • fullTextSearch

        public QueryFragment fullTextSearch(Collection<? extends String> bindingNames,
                                    int flags,
                                    String... patterns)
        This implementation simply uses the SPARQL regex built-in function to execute the search. While supported by all triple stores the performance of this implementation may be rather slow.
        Specified by:
        fullTextSearch in interface IDialect
        Parameters:
        bindingNames - The names of the bindings which should be matched by full-text search.
        flags - The flags to control the full-text search.
        patterns - The search patterns.
        Returns:
        A query fragment for executing the search.
